summary: Service Module Frontend Phase 1 Testing - All UI components verified working. Service Tickets list page, Ticket Detail page with tabs and modals, Engineer Portal login page all render correctly. Auth protection working for engineer routes.

minor.issue: Returns 422 error when fetching supporting data on ticket detail page - non-blocking, page still loads

issues: Missing aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility warning in console

passed_tests: Service Tickets list page (/admin/service-requests) loads correctly
Service Tickets page shows stats cards (Total, Open, Closed, Urgent)
Service Tickets page has New Ticket button with data-testid
Service Tickets page has search input with data-testid
Service Tickets page has status filter dropdown
Service Tickets page has priority filter dropdown
Service Tickets page displays ticket rows with data-testid
Clicking ticket row navigates to detail page (/admin/service-requests/:ticketId)
Ticket detail page loads with data-testid='ticket-detail-page'
Ticket detail page shows ticket info, customer info, status badges
Ticket detail page has Assign button (for new tickets)
Ticket detail page has Schedule Visit button
Ticket detail page has Request Parts button
Ticket detail page has Add Comment button
Ticket detail page has Refresh button
Ticket detail page tabs work: Details, Visits, Parts, History
Assign modal opens with technician select dropdown
Schedule Visit modal opens with form fields (technician, date, time, purpose)
Request Parts modal opens with item selection
Add Comment modal opens with comment textarea and internal note checkbox
Create Service Ticket modal opens with all required fields
Engineer login page renders at /engineer
Engineer login page has email input with data-testid
Engineer login page has password input with data-testid
Engineer login page has login button with data-testid
Technician dashboard redirects to login when not authenticated
Visit detail page redirects to login when not authenticated
History tab shows full ticket lifecycle (new → assigned → in_progress → completed → closed)
critical_code_review_comments: Dialog components missing aria-describedby - add DialogDescription for accessibility compliance
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test data from previous iterations
context_for_next_testing_agent: Service Module Frontend Phase 1 fully tested. All pages render correctly: Service Tickets list (/admin/service-requests), Ticket Detail (/admin/service-requests/:ticketId), Engineer Login (/engineer), Technician Dashboard (/engineer/dashboard - requires auth), Visit Detail (/engineer/visit/:visitId - requires auth). All modals working: Assign, Schedule Visit, Request Parts, Add Comment, Create Ticket. Tabs working: Details, Visits, Parts, History. Engineer portal auth protection working correctly.

elements: Action buttons (Assign, Schedule Visit, Request Parts, Add Comment, Cancel)

Modals.Assign Technician: Opens with technician select and notes field
Modals.Schedule Visit: Opens with technician, date, time from/to, purpose fields
Modals.Request Parts: Opens with item select, quantity, urgency, notes fields
Modals.Add Comment: Opens with comment textarea and internal note checkbox
Modals.Create Ticket: Opens with company, title, description, priority, problem type, contact fields, urgent checkbox

Engineer Portal.Login Page: /engineer - renders with email, password inputs and login button
Engineer Portal.Dashboard: /engineer/dashboard - redirects to login when not authenticated
Engineer Portal.Visit Detail: /engineer/visit/:visitId - redirects to login when not authenticated

screenshots_taken: service_tickets_list.png - Service Tickets list page with stats and ticket rows
ticket_detail.png - Ticket detail page with info cards and action buttons
ticket_detail_tabs.png - Ticket detail with Visits tab open
ticket_history_tab.png - History tab showing full ticket lifecycle
